topics.body:
Okay so some final thoughts on wolf children and I'll shut up about it -forever- probably about 12 hours. 

[spoiler] part of the reason I initially felt uncomfortable about yuki's decision to give up being a wolf was because it seemed like she was ashamed of being herself
Then it hit me, the fact that she revealed herself to sohei was her not being ashamed any more. And she wasn't abandoning it, she just didn't need it any more. 

Still kinda iffy on ame's decision since he's still living so close to hana anyway. I suppose it's justifiable in that he couldn't do his job protecting the mountain with her constantly being afraid for him. The epilogue makes me feel better about that too[/spoiler]
Hooray for closure!
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9
